title: Bicycle Reality TV? ENVE issues casting call for show featuring the ultimate ATB adventure
content:
Are you willing to push through 18 hours of discomfort for the sake of personal growth, transcendence, and transformation … and to win a bike? If so, you’ve got until the end of today to answer ENVE’s open casting call for a one-of-a-kind, bike-powered adventure. Five lucky contestants will get to take part in the

The post Bicycle Reality TV? ENVE issues casting call for show featuring the ultimate ATB adventure appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristen Arendt
